textContent: There's only one dragon in the world. It's kin is everywhere, as they hatch from the egg and roam around without need for protection. Kin is mutated and varied, so there's more than one variation of it.
title: The first dragon
textContentHtml: There's only one dragon in the world. It's kin is everywhere, as they hatch from the egg and roam around without need for protection. Kin is mutated and varied, so there's more than one variation of it.
